document.full_text: wall street bulls took the upper hand with a 1 percent rally on tuesday as hopes for a new plan to deal with greece's debt crisis relieved some investor worry, but grim economic data suggested more hurdles ahead as the s&p 500 closed out its worst month since august.
document.title: greece hopes buoy wall street, but investors still wary
lines_and_colors: wall street bulls took the upper hand with a 1 percent rally on tuesday as hopes for a new plan to deal with greece's debt crisis relieved some investor worry, but grim economic data suggested more hurdles ahead as the s&p 500 closed out its worst month since august.
